content:
Public channel created by Dave Register. Description:

No description.

Dave Register: Hello all active devs.
This channel will be used to describe and discuss the Release Plan for OpenCPN Version 5.14.x.
This is the "official" plan, and all modifications and notifications will be made here.
Basic Plan Outline.

Feature Freeze: 1 Feb, 2026

Beta Test starts: 9 Feb, 2026

Target Release Date: 1 March, 2026

Dave Register: About "Feature Freeze"

  1. As the name implies, at this point in the plan all proposed new Features should be scoped and actively under development.
  2. Feature development completion should target the Beta test start date.
  3. Slippage is expected for some recent Feature additions. It may occur that the target scope of the Feature must be reduced to meet the schedule.
  4. New Features that are not fully complete should try hard to not de-stabilize the core functionality at Beta test start.

I'd like to generate a list of new Features that contributors are working on.
Please describe any such Features, and give us some sense of the progress made, and an idea of how this matches the proposed release schedule.

I would also like comments on the various RFE's found in the github issues list. Critical, fairly important, nice to have, etc.
For reference, at this Release, I consider the release schedule more important than any particular RFE, but I will entertain discussion.

I'll start:

  1. Refactor chart database rebuild process, to include a threaded model for improved performance. Status: Functionally complete, in current master branch, testing ongoing. Plan: Include in O514.

Thanks
I have nothing in the pipe myself. Back later on other stuff
